description:
Would you like to have the knowledge to create simple, inexpensive remedies for: Stress? Anxiety? Insomnia?
YES!
These are just some of the many problems that Aromatherapy has the answer to.

In this course, the British founder of luxury, ethical skincare company: Eden Aromatics Ltd will reveal the Beauty Industry's aromatherapy secrets which help to ease a multitude of mental health symptoms...that you can easily recreate at home with your very own Rescue Kit of only 10 simple essential oils!

If you would like to find out how you can improve these conditions for yourself, in an easy, inexpensive way, this course is for you!:
Feel less stressed, Have a better nights sleep, Increase your concentration, Feel less anxious....(and many more)

In just one hour, this beginners course will give you new knowledge and skills that you can use time and time again to improve your mental wellbeing. You can also share these skills with others, to help improve theirs too.

This course is delivered via video lectures and downloadable notes for you to print off.
title: Transform your Mind using Aromatherapy
